Sentencas: Degradation of a solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) during long-term operation remains to be the key obstacle to their massive production and commercialization.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: One of degradation processes within SOEC is anode delamination.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The anode of SOEC splits at the interface with solid electrolyte due to elevated pressure of oxygen that is produced by electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The main assumption that anode delamination starts at the fuel inlet is based on post-mortem analysis of SOEC.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: This paper addresses numerical modelling of a single, electrolyte supported, SOEC.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The anode delamination is modelled by implementing the modifications of SOEC's geometry.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: A brief overview of the model is also given.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: Verification of the implemented model relies on the measurement data from literature.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The simulation results show that increasing the area of delaminated anode (A(delaminated)) increases the operating voltage of the SOEC if a constant electrolysis current is applied.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: This strongly influences the conversion efficiency (eta) of the SOEC.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: Indeed, if linear growth of A(delaminated) over time is assumed, the eta of SOEC degrades very fast at the beginning of SOEC's operation.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance

Sentencas: The presented model also helps analyze the hot spots of current density, where high pressure of oxygen appears.
Titulo: Modelling of anode delamination in solid oxide electrolysis cell and analysis of its effects on electrochemical performance
